key_channel_insights.line_content: OTAs list only 48% of Finnair itineraries and price every found fare higher (≈0.44%), signalling lost visibility without competitive upside.
Metasearch now delivers 64% parity but still undercuts the website on one-third of checks at an average 8% discount—Finnair’s main leakage point.
The GDS misses 52% of website fares and marks up 47% of those found (≈0.45%), offering neither coverage nor price advantage.

conclusion.line_content: This report provides a high-level summary of the price discrepancies observed across different channels.  It is important to note that the data contains many nuances depending on various factors such as market conditions, booking windows, and the competitive landscape. Understanding these subtleties can be critical in optimizing pricing strategies and ensuring competitive positioning.

As part of our 'PriceEye' solution, we are developing an intuitive dashboard designed to help your airline's analysts drill down into this data. This tool will allow you to uncover and focus on critical actionable insights, enabling your team to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

We are here to support you in leveraging these insights to enhance your revenue management and distribution strategies. Please don't hesitate to connect with our team for more information about how PriceEye can assist you in achieving your business objectives.

ota_highlights.line_content: OTAs carried only 52% of website fares last week, a 1.9-ppt drop WoW and 1.8-ppt MoM.
Whenever present, OTA fares were higher 100% of the time at a stable 0.44% average uplift.
Long-haul and non-Finnish origins show full OTA presence yet at a premium; Finnish short-haul routes suffer the highest unavailability.

ota_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: More than half of ODs are absent on OTAs, and the gap is growing week-over-week.
0% of checks matched or beat the website price, removing any price-based stimulation.
All available fares carry a 0.44% premium; share of higher-priced itineraries fell 1.9 ppts as more fares simply disappeared.

ota_summary_by_region.line_content: 54.5% missing; found fares +0.46% vs Finnair.com, with coverage slipping 1.9 ppts WoW.
100% coverage but at a 0.17% premium, essentially flat MoM.

ota_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 68% of routes not listed; remaining fares +0.45%.
Near-complete coverage with a steady 0.42% markup.

ota_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: Coverage weaker (56.7% missing) and highest premium (+0.53%).

mse_highlights.line_content: MSE parity jumped to 64% (+9 ppts WoW, +4 ppts MoM).
33% of itineraries remain cheaper on MSE, averaging an 8% discount despite a 10% WoW reduction.
Non-Finnish POS (80% lower) and long-haul (65% lower, −18%) drive most revenue risk.

mse_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Coverage is effectively complete; missing content poses minimal risk.
Now the dominant outcome, reflecting recent distribution control gains.
Still one-third of checks show an 8% markdown, the primary area for intervention.

mse_summary_by_region.line_content: Undercuts 65% with an 18% discount—high-value leakage despite small sample.

mse_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: Parity strongest at 79%; undercuts limited to 18% (−8%).
80% of quotes undercut website (−8%); parity only 15%.

mse_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: Parity 59%; 36% cheaper on MSE with −10% gap.
Parity peaks at 70%; undercuts fall to 29% with a modest −5% gap.

gds_highlights.line_content: GDS missing 52% of itineraries, a 1.8-ppt worsening WoW.
47% of found fares are higher by 0.45%; <1% are lower.
Finnish origins lack content (68% missing), while non-Finnish origins have 98% coverage but 98% higher prices.

gds_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Gap widening, especially for far-out bookings and Finnish origins.
Nearly all priced itineraries show a 0.45% premium, up to 0.53% for far-out travel.

gds_summary_by_region.line_content: 100% coverage; all higher-priced but smaller +0.18% premium.

gds_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: 56% missing; highest premium at +0.53%, worsening 2.9 ppts WoW.
